Others: The New York Yankees beat the Kansas City Royals 4-3 in extra-innings on Wednesday night.
The win moves the Yankees to 84-62 this season while the loss drops Kansas City to 80-67.
Juan Soto went 1-for-5 with a home run, two RBI and a run scored in the game.
Soto is now 8th on the list of players with the most home runs before turning 26, with 199 career HR.
The Yankees will face the Boston Red Sox on Thursday night.
